title: Multiple DRCSim issues, including p3d and Camera plugin missing includes 2.5, and 2.6.1

content.raw:
I have several issues on my install of DRCSim, that have been going on for some time, however, I assumed if I waited long enough the issues would be resolved since others had previously qualified. To begin with I get countless errors at startup, many that have always been there, and many that are new within last few weeks.

The following errors seem to be the most critical to my testing, since I need the cameras to qualify:

~~~
Msg Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
Msg Publicized address: 192.168.1.103
Dbg camera(0) name [default::left(0)]
Dbg camera(1) name [default::right(1)]
[ INFO] [1368934564.414076017]: Camera plugin missing <CxPrime>, defaults to 0
[ INFO] [1368934564.417307992]: Camera plugin missing <Cx>, defaults to 0
[ INFO] [1368934564.417689884]: Camera plugin missing <Cy>, defaults to 0
[ INFO] [1368934564.419447160]: Camera plugin missing <focalLength>, defaults to 0
[ INFO] [1368934564.421108126]: Camera plugin missing <CxPrime>, defaults to 0
[ INFO] [1368934564.422666285]: Camera plugin missing <Cx>, defaults to 0
[ INFO] [1368934564.423000336]: Camera plugin missing <Cy>, defaults to 0
[ INFO] [1368934564.423281657]: Camera plugin missing <focalLength>, defaults to 0
[ INFO] [1368934568.408008691]: drc vehicle not found.
[ INFO] [1368934568.413907071]: fire_hose_model [fire_hose] not found
~~~

below the above messages I get the following error:
~~~
[ INFO] [1368934572.798367412]: p3d plugin missing <frameName>, defaults to world
[ INFO] [1368934572.801169585]: p3d plugin missing <xyzOffset>, defaults to 0s
[ INFO] [1368934572.806228393]: p3d plugin missing <rpyOffset>, defaults to 0s
[ INFO] [1368934572.807135003]: p3d plugin missing <gaussianNoise>, defaults to 0.0
[ INFO] [1368934572.926152028]: Loading MultiSense ROS node.
[ INFO] [1368934573.599682786, 0.011000000]: AtlasPlugin default controller statistics 1kHz
~~~

To begin with I get the following warnings on multiple pids that I read are known issue, and can be ignored:
~~~
process[multisense_sl_robot_state_publisher-4]: started with pid [25348]
Exception AttributeError: AttributeError("'_DummyThread' object has no attribute '_Thread__block'",) in <module 'threading' from '/usr/lib/python2.7/threading.pyc'> ignored
~~~

Lastly, after initialization I get the following messages:
~~~
Warning [Publisher.cc:127] Queue limit reached for topic /gazebo/default/pose/info, deleting message. This warning is printed only once.
Warning [Publisher.cc:127] Queue limit reached for topic /gazebo/default/world_stats, deleting message. This warning is printed only once.
Warning [Publisher.cc:127] Queue limit reached for topic /gazebo/default/diagnostics, deleting message. This warning is printed only once.
Warning [Publisher.cc:127] Queue limit reached for topic /gazebo/default/physics/contacts, deleting message. This warning is printed only once.
Warning [Publisher.cc:127] Queue limit reached for topic /gazebo/default/atlas::pelvis, deleting message. This warning is printed only once.
Warning [Publisher.cc:127] Queue limit reached for topic /gazebo/default/atlas::head, deleting message. 
~~~

The Simulator barely runs, but in qualification it literally takes several minutes to load, and then movements take forever. Any advice you can give me on resolving these issues will be appreciated. I've tried all of the instructions, and reinstalled multiple times.
content.html:
I have several issues on my install of DRCSim, that have been going on for some time, however, I assumed if I waited long enough the issues would be resolved since others had previously qualified. To begin with I get countless errors at startup, many that have always been there, and many that are new within last few weeks.

The following errors seem to be the most critical to my testing, since I need the cameras to qualify:

Msg Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
Msg Publicized address: 192.168.1.103
Dbg camera(0) name [default::left(0)]
Dbg camera(1) name [default::right(1)]
[ INFO] [1368934564.414076017]: Camera plugin missing <CxPrime>, defaults to 0
[ INFO] [1368934564.417307992]: Camera plugin missing <Cx>, defaults to 0
[ INFO] [1368934564.417689884]: Camera plugin missing <Cy>, defaults to 0
[ INFO] [1368934564.419447160]: Camera plugin missing <focalLength>, defaults to 0
[ INFO] [1368934564.421108126]: Camera plugin missing <CxPrime>, defaults to 0
[ INFO] [1368934564.422666285]: Camera plugin missing <Cx>, defaults to 0
[ INFO] [1368934564.423000336]: Camera plugin missing <Cy>, defaults to 0
[ INFO] [1368934564.423281657]: Camera plugin missing <focalLength>, defaults to 0
[ INFO] [1368934568.408008691]: drc vehicle not found.
[ INFO] [1368934568.413907071]: fire_hose_model [fire_hose] not found

below the above messages I get the following error:

[ INFO] [1368934572.798367412]: p3d plugin missing <frameName>, defaults to world
[ INFO] [1368934572.801169585]: p3d plugin missing <xyzOffset>, defaults to 0s
[ INFO] [1368934572.806228393]: p3d plugin missing <rpyOffset>, defaults to 0s
[ INFO] [1368934572.807135003]: p3d plugin missing <gaussianNoise>, defaults to 0.0
[ INFO] [1368934572.926152028]: Loading MultiSense ROS node.
[ INFO] [1368934573.599682786, 0.011000000]: AtlasPlugin default controller statistics 1kHz

To begin with I get the following warnings on multiple pids that I read are known issue, and can be ignored:

process[multisense_sl_robot_state_publisher-4]: started with pid [25348]
Exception AttributeError: AttributeError("'_DummyThread' object has no attribute '_Thread__block'",) in <module 'threading' from '/usr/lib/python2.7/threading.pyc'> ignored

Lastly, after initialization I get the following messages:

Warning [Publisher.cc:127] Queue limit reached for topic /gazebo/default/pose/info, deleting message. This warning is printed only once.
Warning [Publisher.cc:127] Queue limit reached for topic /gazebo/default/world_stats, deleting message. This warning is printed only once.
Warning [Publisher.cc:127] Queue limit reached for topic /gazebo/default/diagnostics, deleting message. This warning is printed only once.
Warning [Publisher.cc:127] Queue limit reached for topic /gazebo/default/physics/contacts, deleting message. This warning is printed only once.
Warning [Publisher.cc:127] Queue limit reached for topic /gazebo/default/atlas::pelvis, deleting message. This warning is printed only once.
Warning [Publisher.cc:127] Queue limit reached for topic /gazebo/default/atlas::head, deleting message.

The Simulator barely runs, but in qualification it literally takes several minutes to load, and then movements take forever. Any advice you can give me on resolving these issues will be appreciated. I've tried all of the instructions, and reinstalled multiple times.
